reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: No usable content without clicking into the app, waste of time. A widget that would be really useful would be a summary of an individual watched item, so you can see at a glance the status of a listing (without having to open the app! )
reviews.author: Wilf Moralee

reviews.title: where is it?
reviews.comment: Can\'t find it anywhere? Not registered on my apps list but showing on play store. Confused!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too much use battery
reviews.comment: Tab 7.7 after add widget my battery flat so fast. Even it useful but other tools also can alert me to bid and no need spending lot of resource as this app.

reviews.title: Total crap
reviews.comment: Says installed,its not anywhere,not in apps list not in wigget list,but play store shows a tick to say i have it,looks like im not alone either,best you get it sorted as this has the potential to be one of the most downloaded apps in the store ,but not if it dont bloody work

reviews.title: Not worth installing.
reviews.comment: Expected a widget that showed countdown of items watched or bidding on. Just a bunch of shortcuts. Step it up eBay!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well...
reviews.comment: For what it is, This app is good. But, and somebody looks at the title and sees the word \"eBay Widgets\", They would expect it to be widgets, not just short cuts to your app. I thought that it use the app to download your results, all it does is just a shortcut to it. If you had a rooted device, you could do this without the app.
reviews.author: Tim Johnson

reviews.title: Crashes several times a day...
reviews.comment: ...and freezes my phone for a minute or two each time it does. This widget is a real let-down considering how good the app is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some info
reviews.comment: The latest update caused my nexus 7 ebay app to constantly crash and I couldn\'t open the app at all. Uninstalled app and widget, reinstalled both and working again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Been using eBay mobile app for over a year or so now. Works well in many ways. Fast and easy to use. No real complaints. Thank u

reviews.comment: But biggest flaw is that it doesn\'t appear in recent apps when using eBay through the Widgets.

reviews.title: It\'s a Shortcut Widget
reviews.comment: Not worth the space on my home screen, would rather have the extra click on single eBay app shortcut. Standard app should notify of events, no need for this shortcut widget.  Works on Rooted phone.  Remember, it\'s a widget, so for most users, long press on blank home screen, click widgets, scroll until you find eBay and select, try it, might be useful to you.

reviews.title: Useless until they fix the logging off problem
reviews.comment: Was working perfect but now it\'s useless. Keeps logging me off saying \"session has expired\" as soon as I log in. Has been doing this for awhile now.

reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: Last 2 versions are progressively getting worse.  Notifications now  arrive 15minutes after auction has finished. Frequently times out. Bids don\'t arrive. Uptown 2hours later outbid alerts arrive. Other EBay applications still work perfectly... For 6months+ it was a great application now the last 2updates have killed it.  Use a third party EBay application!
